borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint12.custom:security: Users must have sufficient collateral to borrow
borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint12.details: Borrows debt from the lending pool

checkLiquidation(address).details: Checks if a borrower's position is liquidatable

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to check

returns.borrowValue: The current borrow value in USD
returns.collateralValue: The current collateral value in USD
returns.isLiquidatable: Whether the position can be liquidated

liquidateByDEX(address,uint256).details: Liquidates an unhealthy position using DEX swapping

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate
params.liquidationIncentive: The liquidation incentive in basis points (e.g., 500 = 5%)

returns.liquidatedAmount: Amount of debt repaid through liquidation

liquidateByMEV(address,uint256,uint256).details: Liquidates an unhealthy position by allowing MEV/external liquidator to buy collateral

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate
params.liquidationIncentive: The liquidation incentive in basis points
params.repayAmount: Amount of debt the liquidator wants to repay

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,b.custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function

params._fromPosition: Whether to repay from position balance
params._token: Address of the token used for repayment
params._user: Address of the user repaying the debt

supplyCollateral(uint256,address).custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function
supplyCollateral(uint256,address).details: Supplies collateral to the lending pool

params._user: Address of the user to supply collateral

supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function
supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).details: Supplies liquidity to the lending pool

params._user: Address of the user to supply liquidity

withdrawCollateral(uint256).custom:security: Users must have sufficient collateral and maintain healthy positions
withdrawCollateral(uint256).details: Withdraws supplied collateral from the user's position

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).custom:security: Users must have sufficient shares to withdraw
withdrawLiquidity(uint256).details: Withdraws supplied liquidity by redeeming shares

params._shares: Number of shares to redeem for underlying tokens

borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint12.notice: This function allows users to borrow against their collateral

liquidateByDEX(address,uint256).notice: Anyone can call this function to liquidate unhealthy positions

liquidateByMEV(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Liquidator pays debt and receives collateral with incentive

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,b.notice: This function allows users to repay their borrowed debt

supplyCollateral(uint256,address).notice: This function allows users to deposit collateral

supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: This function allows users to provide liquidity for borrowing

withdrawCollateral(uint256).notice: This function allows users to withdraw their collateral

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).notice: This function allows users to withdraw their supplied liquidity
